text: The Totally Techie World of Young Dilbert: Hi-Tech Hijinks is a 1997 education game for Windows and Macintosh released by KnowWonder, based on the comic strip Dilbert.https://www.thefreelibrary.com/Introducing+Young+Dilbert+-+Boy+Wonder+of+the+High- Tech+World.-a019833857 == References == == External links == * https://homepages.rpi.edu/~bulloj/search/DILBERT.html Category:1997 video games Category:Dilbert Category:Educational video games Category:Mac OS games Category:Video games based on comics Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games
title: The Totally Techie World of Young Dilbert
